summary: A man wanders aimlessly, away from his town, away from the woman he loved, emotionally and socially inactive.
cast: Steve Cochran|Alida Valli|Dorian Gray|Jacqueline Jones|Gabriella Pallotta|Pina Boldrini|Guerrino Campanilli|Mirna Girardi|Lilia Landi|Gaetano Matteucci|Betsy Blair|Pietro Corvelatti|Elli Parvo
title: El grito
